# familyName

**Instance Property**

The family name of the font—for example, “Times” or “Helvetica.”

## Declaration

```swift
var familyName: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

This name is the one that `NSFontManager` uses and may differ slightly from the AFM name.

The value in this property is intended for an application’s internal usage and not for display. To get a name that you can display to the user, use the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFont/displayName] property instead.

## Getting Font Names

- **displayName**: The name of the font, including family and face names, to use when displaying the font information to the user.
- **fontName**: The full name of the font, as used in PostScript language code—for example, “Times-Roman” or “Helvetica-Oblique.”
